name: fingch

stmt.origin: sseqtr4i(cfn, cgch, cun(cfn, cab(hs0, wal(hs1, wn(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), csdm, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cpw(cv(hs0)))))))))

body.origin:
|- wss(cfn, cgch)
-| wss(cfn, cun(cfn, cab(hs0, wal(hs1, wn(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), csdm, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cpw(cv(hs0)))))))))
-| wceq(cgch, cun(cfn, cab(hs0, wal(hs1, wn(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), csdm, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cpw(cv(hs0)))))))))
body.pretty:
⊢ Fin ⊆ GCH
⊣ Fin ⊆(Fin ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(hs1, ¬(hs0[≺]hs1 ∧ hs1[≺]P(hs0)))})
⊣ GCH =(Fin ⋃ { hs0 | ∀(hs1, ¬(hs0[≺]hs1 ∧ hs1[≺]P(hs0)))})
